Name: Stack Split Redux
Author: pepoluan, tstaples (original idea)
Description: Custom stack splitting, originally known as StackSplitX

Meta:ChangeLog.0.12.1: Internal optimizations for CraftingPageHandler, Play sound only once for crafting/cooking
Meta:ChangeLog.0.13.0: Implement GMCM support, Lots of internal optimizations, Fix exception if _materialContainers is null
Meta:ChangeLog.0.13.2: Fix bug with determining how many items are being held
Meta:ChangeLog.0.14.1: BuyAction.CanPerformAction now uses MaxPurchasable instead of simple item.sellPrice
